item.title: iPhone 7 Launch
item.dc:creator: Dan Brown
item.description: We anticipated the iPhone 7 was going to be a big deal, and it was, so we created a series of high color photo compositions highlighting our offerings for the new device. This campaign was a lot of fun and easily one of my favorites.
item.content:encoded: We anticipated the iPhone 7 was going to be a big deal, and it was, so we created a series of high color photo compositions highlighting our offerings for the new device. This campaign was a lot of fun and easily one of my favorites.

item.title: Gift Guide – Holiday 2016
item.dc:creator: Dan Brown
item.description: It’s always a challenge to come up with holiday concepts that are not too specific, or too traditional while still capturing the excitement and joy of the end of the year. This design was very simple conceptually but the end result was pleasing and cheerful without being obnoxious.
item.content:encoded: It’s always a challenge to come up with holiday concepts that are not too specific, or too traditional while still capturing the excitement and joy of the end of the year. This design was very simple conceptually but the end result was pleasing and cheerful without being obnoxious.

item.title: Holiday Cards
item.dc:creator: Dan Brown
item.description: I occasionally have the opportunity to design digital holiday cards. The budgets and timeline are always tight but they’re a good time and help me get into the holiday spirit so I always say “yes”.
item.content:encoded:
I occasionally have the opportunity to design digital holiday cards.
The budgets and timeline are always tight but they’re a good time and help me get into the holiday spirit so I always say “yes”.

item.title: Beam – Product Page
item.dc:creator: Dan Brown
item.description: As the flagship product of Griffin Medical, Beam gets a little extra attention. We don’t create large-scale single-focus product pages very often but when we do they are all custom built and completely separate from our existing code structure.
item.content:encoded: As the flagship product of Griffin Medical, Beam gets a little extra attention. We don’t create large-scale single-focus product pages very often but when we do they are all custom built and completely separate from our existing code structure.

item.title: Fenwick’s 300
item.dc:creator: Dan Brown
item.description: Having long been a fan of the Bongo Java brand and family of products I was thrilled when Derek got in touch to inquire about my making a site for their new venture, Fenwick’s 300. Their only two criteria were that it had to be 100% user editable and it had to be done on... Read more »
item.content:encoded: Having long been a fan of the Bongo Java brand and family of products I was thrilled when Derek got in touch to inquire about my making a site for their new venture, Fenwick’s 300. Their only two criteria were that it had to be 100% user editable and it had to be done on an extremely abbreviated timeline. Fortunately they were the perfect clients for requests like that, very responsive to requests for review and very quick learners, must be all the coffee!
